title: WTB T206 Commons in poor condition
author: Hardspun8

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Commons in poor condition
posts.post_content: Hello all, I'm looking for common T206 cards in poor to beat condition.  The amount of love the card has seen doesn't matter as long as you can tell who it is and it isn't trimmed and able to be graded at some point.  Thanks for your time.
I'm looking forward to seeing the cards you sent cbrandtw.
